casebody.data:
ALOHA BED & BREAKFAST, petitioner,
v.
Diane CERVELLI, et al. No. 18-451. Supreme Court of the United States March 18, 2019.

Motion of Foundation for Moral Law for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Ethics & Religious Liberty Commission of the Southern Baptist Convention for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawaii denied.
